translations: 非人格性；无人情味；与个人无关；冷静

sentences.sentence: Those have to be the tears and shivers of impersonality.
sentences.translation: 非个人化的泪水和颤抖。

sentences.sentence: Amongst the impersonality of the Internet, this is a way of bridging the cyber gap.
sentences.translation: 其中客观的因特网，这是一种弥合数码鸿沟。

sentences.sentence: To us the impersonality of electronic communication has little or no relation to the significance of the matter at hand.
sentences.translation: 就我们而言，电子交流的缺乏人情味与我们手头上事情的重要性之间很少有或完全没有关系。
